definitions.text: a person who is of equal standing with another in a group

examples: One dollar equals 1,000 rubles these days!

definitions.text: be equal to in quality or ability
examples: Nothing can rival cotton for durability
Your performance doesn't even touch that of your colleagues
Her persistence and ambition only matches that of her parents

definitions.text: make equal, uniform, corresponding, or matching
examples: let's equalize the duties among all employees in this office
The company matched the discount policy of its competitors

definitions.text: having the same quantity, value, or measure as another
examples: all men are equal before the law

definitions.text: having the requisite qualities or resources to meet a task
examples: she was adequate to the job
he was equal to the task
